title: Tile, late 18th–early 19th century
medium: Earthenware, glazed and high fire decoration
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Standing woman, right arm raised and pointing to upper corner; dressed in multi-colored checkered skirt, yellow shirt and white shawl. Chinoiserie type decoration.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tile, late 18th–early 19th century.
late 18th–early 19th century. Earthenware, glazed and high fire decoration. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1920-15-20.
